suncertify.gui.beans
Class TableBean

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JScrollPane
                  suncertify.gui.core.GUIBean
                      suncertify.gui.beans.TableBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, CommandListener
public class TableBean
extends GUIBean

A GUIBean to show a list of HotelRooms in a table format. These lists are received from the Mediator as SearchCommand results.

TableBean instances can generate the following events:

  • Selection events: fired when a new room is selected
  • Action events: fired when the KeyEvent.VK_ENTER key is pressed over a selected room
Components interested in be notified of these events can register to the instance as listeners.

Version:
1.0 06/10/2010
Author:
Ignacio del Valle Alles
See Also:
Serialized Form

commandEnded

public void commandEnded(Command<?,?> cmd)
In case of cmd being an instance of SearchCommand class, the TableBean instance updates the table with the new results.

Fired after a command execution. Target method result can be retrieved from Command.getResult().

Parameters:
cmd - the executed command.

commandExceptionEnded

public void commandExceptionEnded(Command<?,?> cmd)
This method does nothing.

Fired if an exception is thrown during command target method execution. The exception can be retrieved from Command.getException().

Parameters:
cmd - the executed command.

commandStarted

public void commandStarted(Command<?,?> cmd)
This method does nothing.

Fired when a command is about to be executed.

Parameters:
cmd - the command to be executed.
